channel.title: Help connecting to server
channel.description: Ok, so I have my server up, my friends can connect to it, but when I try to connect It doesnt work I tried 127.0.0.1 I tried 0.0.0.0 I tried localhost I tried the server IP (the .no-ip.biz ip) I tried the PF Ip (the ip before the .no-ip.biz I dont know what to do, but my friends can do it but they havnt tried with the client, but I can't get any other client to load, so I am assuming its the client, but the client works for other people on other servers.

item.title: Help connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @PK_4_LIF33 PK 4 LIF33
item.description:
@PK_4_LIF33 wrote:

What works for me is my ip 127.0.0.1, then copy the client and put the noip ip in tht one.

  1. run YOUR SOURCE ( 127.0.0.1 ) and i portforwarded with utorrent ( just get utorrent and go options then preferences, enter your port (43594) then check all boxes apart from “randomize port each start”!
  2. Now open up noip and make sure the noip you are using that the box is UNCHECKED should have like sunglasses on.
  3. Thats all u need to do, jsut leave noip, utorrent and the soruce up and your server will be online.

Things To Remember - *ALLWAYS USE YOUR SOURCE AND CLEINT TO LOG INTO, NOT THE COPYED ONES.
*Make sure internet is allways on!

  • And just leave NOIP,UTORRENT AND THE SOURCE running.
    *SEND THE COPYED ONE TO YOUR MATES, JUST CLEINT NOT SORUCE.

Hope this helped man, i was stuck on this i know how annoying it got, enjoy your server ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Help connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @BigBadSoft BigBadSoft
item.description:
@BigBadSoft wrote:

Ok, so I have my server up, my friends can connect to it, but when I try to connect It doesnt work
I tried 127.0.0.1
I tried 0.0.0.0
I tried localhost
I tried the server IP (the .no-ip.biz ip)
I tried the PF Ip (the ip before the .no-ip.biz
I dont know what to do, but my friends can do it but they havnt tried with the client, but I can’t get any other client to load, so I am assuming its the client, but the client works for other people on other servers.

Read full topic
